DOC.brief_summary: This research study adult establish type 2 diabetes test whether daily vitamin D supplementation affect body process glucose ( sugar ) .
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Established Type 2 Diabetes ( DDM2 )
DOC.criteria: Established type 2 diabetes , define one follow two criterion : Age ≥ 25 year ≤ 75 year BMI : 23 40 kg/m2 inclusive Provision sign date write informed consent prior study procedure . Major Exclusion Criteria `` Severe '' diabetes define one follow criterion : ( ) Symptoms hyperglycemia ; ( b ) Screening HbA1c ≥ 7.5 [ may indicate potential rapid progression trial necessitate need amplify diabetesspecific pharmacotherapy ] History nephrolithiasis hypercalcemia
